entry.title: You Writing this Down, Miss Gazette?
entry.summary:
Author: finkhiscool

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,140Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 620

Summary: Y/N, a crime reporter at the Gotham Gazette, catches a lead about the Red Hood, new crime lord terrorizing… other crime lords? And what is the guy's connection to The Bat? Well, you guess it's better than terrorizing the public like every other rogue.You’ll uncover his story no matter what it takes.Jason has been through Hell and back. Now, he’s back in his beloved, blood-covered Gotham City. Black Mask and Batman won’t know what hit them. And the, uh, the reporter—he doesn’t quite know what to do about her.He’ll change Gotham from the inside out like Bruce never could.(Smut starts chap 5, if you’re curious)

entry.title: Since You've Been Gone
entry.summary:
Author: suberbantokyodrift

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,784Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 57

Summary: Ten years ago you were in high school with Jason Todd and assigned as science partners. But a week after, he dies. His death shook you to the point you have to live with your divorced father in the Midwest. Ten years later, however, you move back to help take care of your ailing grandmother. Jason, however, is very much alive. Well, resurrected. And he doesn't plan on you leaving his life again.

entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,455Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 73

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story—a quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting.At least, that’s what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns.No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she’s staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. Or that the detectives neighbor was a really cute guy.

entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,181Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 15

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.

entry.summary:
Author: Thewriting_hub

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,711Chapters: 12/40Kudos: 257

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere. entry.title: Project Shattercore
entry.summary:
Author: rikaisdeadx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,023Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 74

Summary: you were taken so young—too young to remember anything but needles and pain. locked in a lab that never quieted, they amplified every whisper of thought within you, reshaping you into something beyond what you should have been. after endless experiments, your rescuer finally arrives.he’s tall, shadowed by secrets, and undeniably frightening… yet somehow, he offers you a place to belong. in the vast, silent halls of his mansion, you feel invisible—an outsider blamed for every strange glance. but as days pass and walls of stone seem to soften, the people here begin to notice you. they smile. they reach out. and you start to wonder: is this longing in their eyes… normal?

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,280Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: Chromatic silence
entry.summary:
Author: corpsedogs

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,861Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 323

Summary: And then.. it happens. Your world explodes.Just a single brief touch. It didn’t even last a second, but that’s all it took.The color rushes in and you inhale sharply.Jason.. he was all red and shadows, his hoodie the deepest rust and his skin warm in the golden lamplight. You blink, nearly stumbling as you grab the railing like it’ll hold your sanity in place.But then you looked at Jason, staring at the distance like nothing happened.You internally panicked.He doesn’t see it.He doesn’t feel it. A.K.A The reader’s soulmate power is to see colors for the first time when she touches her soulmate. When she met Jason, her world bursts to color but not his. She fell for him quietly, but she’s not his and she’s torn between waiting for his colors to come or moving on.

entry.title: Cartoon logic
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,473Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: "Why does everything have to be so boring and a letdown?"When stuff happens, people say forgive and forget, to be the bigger person and all the fruity shit like that. [M/N] tried that, he tried to be nice and tried to be resume his life. But he couldn't brutally robbed of his future by Spider-Man, New York's favorite hero. Accidental and left [M/N] with limp and chronic pain that made his life in sufferable, as his dreams were sliced in half and forced onto a different path. How he would give so much to be able to live again without pain, without stress and pressure.To be free and get what he desires most. But that's not how life works and [M/N] is forced to be content with it.Until he finds a mask."I'm green and mean and not a fighting machine~!"

entry.title: THE SPIDER (Yandere! Batfam x reader)
entry.summary:
Author: mavimoon

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,847Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 110

Summary: Gotham is a city that devours color.[Name] knows this better than anyone.Now, thrust into the gilded cage of Wayne Manor, she finds herself a stranger among fractured souls: a father who won’t meet her eyes, brothers who guard their wounds like weapons, and a butler whose kindness feels like the last candle in a storm.But Gotham’s gray is a lie, cause beneath its concrete skin, something pulses, a spectrum only she can see. The Bat may own the night, but [Name] carries her mother’s defiance in her veins: where they carve shadows, she will paint fire.

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,567Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 216

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.

entry.summary:
Author: katsukistofu
